alert-plugin.name: alert-microblog
alert-plugin.description: Alert sender plugin that sends alert notifications via Microblog serviecs (twitter, laconi.ca, ..)
alert-plugin.serverplugin:help: This alert sender plugin is used to send notifications via Microblogging services that use a Twitter-like API like laconi.ca / identi.ca or twitter itself

c:simple-property.name: microblogServerUrl
c:simple-property.description: Base URL of the Microblog server (twitter.com for twitter, http://identi.ca/api for Status.net)
